trans-unit.source: Provides a base class for .NET Framework attributes that report the use scope of attached properties.
trans-unit.target: 提供報告附加屬性使用範圍之 .NET Framework 屬性的基底類別。

trans-unit.source: The meaning of the term `browsable` as used in descriptions for this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] (and derived classes) is analogous to the descriptions given for <xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute>, but the browsable state for an attached property is particularly relevant to property information for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], because an attached property is primarily a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] concept.
trans-unit.target: 一詞的意義`browsable`會用在此描述[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]（和衍生類別） 類似於提供的描述<xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute>，但附加屬性的可瀏覽狀態是特別屬性資訊[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]，附加的屬性主要是因為[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]概念。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體。
